text: (Ani yala uttara detana) he durbala loka tya ghamendi lokanna sangatila (mulica nahi) kimbahuna ratrandivasa labadine amhala, allahasobata kupra karanyasa ani tyacyasobata sahabhagi tharavinyasa tumaca adesa dene, amacya be'imanice karana tharale ani azabala (siksa-yatanela) pahataca sarvacya sarva manatalya manata lajjita hota asatila ani kaphirancya galyata amhi tauka (jokhada) taku, tyanna kevala tyancya krtakarmanca mobadala dila ja'ila
